name: Wondershot
description: Wondershot is a local multiplayer battle arena! You have only one ammo and one life to defeat your opponent. Each round, your weapon changes and the map does too. No luck, just skill !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 /10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 /10 Processor: 3.3 GHz Intel Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
